# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability
If you discover a security issue, do not post it publicly in Issues.
Contact the maintainer through a private channel.

## Sensitive Data Rule
Do not submit:
- tokens, API keys, certificates, private keys
- personally identifying information
- device identifiers, account numbers, legal evidence containing PII

## Disclosure
Any submitted sensitive material may be removed, and credentials will be rotated if exposure is suspected.
